snippet.title: Deep Sky Derelicts: Definitive Edition - Announcement Trailer [Turn-based strategy RPG]
snippet.description:
Deep Sky Derelicts: Definitive Edition is now available for PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and Switch!

Experience Deep Sky Derelicts in its ultimate, definitive edition, which combines the overhauled base game with its two DLCs: New Prospects and Station Life. Both additions bring new gameplay features, character upgrades, home base improvements, monsters, missions and much more!

Platforms:
PC - http://bit.ly/DSD_Steam
PS4 - https://bit.ly/DSD_DE_PS4
Xbox One - https://bit.ly/DSD_DE_XB1
Switch - https://bit.ly/DSD_DE_Switch

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#DeepSkyDerelicts #TurnBased #RPG
